alert.note: Alert for Inland Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 6:58PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pasco County through 745 PM EDT... At 658 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Zephyrhills West, or near Zephyrhills, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zephyrhills, Dade City, St. Leo, Zephyrhills West, Zephyrhills North, Zephyrhills South, Wesley Chapel South, San Antonio, Saint Leo, Darby, Zephyrhills Municipal Airport, Wesley Chapel, Richland, Dade City North, Meadow Pointe and Crystal Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
